amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection Of Persons And Property
amendatorysection.para: (a) A transfer on death resulting from a registration in beneficiary form is effective by reason of the contract regarding the registration between the owner and the registering entity and sections 30-2734 to 30-2745 and is not testamentary.
(b) Sections 30-2734 to 30-2745 do not limit the rights of creditors of security owners against beneficiaries and other transferees under other laws of this state.
